import React from 'react' import data from './../data'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' const ProductScreen = (props) => { const product = data.products.find(x => x._id === props.match.params.id) return (
Back to result

  • {product.name}

  • {product.rating} Stars ({product.numReviews} Reviews)
  • Price: ${product.price}
  • Description:
    {product.description}
  • Price: {product.price}
  • Status: {product.price}
  • Price: {product.price}
) } export default ProductScreen
